inlineContent.text: The StripePaymentSheet module is compatible with apps targeting iOS 13.0 or above.
for fine-grained documentation of all the classes and methods in the SDK.

If you link this library manually, use a version from our

abstract.text: PaymentSheet is a prebuilt UI that combines all the steps required to pay - collecting payment details, billing details, and confirming the payment - into a single sheet that displays on top of your app.

An object representing parameters to confirm a SetupIntent object.
For example, you would confirm a SetupIntent when a customer hits the “Save” button on a payment method management view in your app.
If the selected payment method does not require any additional steps from the customer, the SetupIntent’s status will transition to
.  Otherwise, it will transition to
, and suggest additional actions via
Instead of passing this to
directly, we recommend using
to handle any additional steps for you.

PaymentSheet is a prebuilt UI that combines all the steps required to pay - collecting payment details, billing details, and confirming the payment - into a single sheet that displays on top of your app.

is a utility class that confirms PaymentIntents/SetupIntents and handles any authentication required, such as 3DS1/3DS2 for Strong Customer Authentication.
It can present authentication UI on top of your app or redirect users out of your app (to e.g. their banking app).
